title: Nick Lachey combines work and play as he takes family to Disney World where he and 98 Degrees played
text:
It is, famously, the happiest place on earth.

And Nick Lachey plus wife Vanessa and their three children certainly looked delighted to be at Disney World in Orlando, Florida, in a snap the proud mom and BH90210 star shared on Instagram on Thursday.

Vanessa, 38, looked gorgeous in a black and white striped dress and wide brimmed black hat as she held Pheonix, two, on her hip and put a protective arm around Camden six.

Family Fun: Nick Lachey and his BH90210 star wife Vanessa took their children to Disney World inOrlando, Florida where he performed with boy band 98 Degrees

Nick held daddy's girl Brooklyn, four, on his hip.

It was, in fact, a working holiday for Nick, 45, as he and his boy band, 98 Degrees, reunited to sing at the theme park's Epcot International Food & Wine Festival.

98 Degrees - Nick and his brother Drew, 43, Justin Jeffre, 46, Jeff Timmons, 46 - belted out their hits twice a day on Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday.

And N'Sync's Joey Fatone, 42, stood in as an occasional vocalist.

Working holiday: Nick and his boy band 98 Degrees, plus Joey Fantone from NSync, performed their hits and more at Disney World's Epcot International Food & Wine Festival

Giving it his all: The 45-year-old and the band - Nick's brother Drew, 43, Justin Jeffre, 46, and Jeff Timmons, 46, played two gigs a day on Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday

Members of the audience could be heard screaming when they started dancing to N'Sync's Bye By Bye in an Instagram video that Nick shared.

He captioned it: 'Turns out @realjoeyfatone does sing on other days that end in “y” besides Friday. #FatoneTuesday ...thanks for coming out buddy!!'

Nick also shared a shot of him and the band singing Britney Spears' Hit Me Baby One More Time, which ended with him throwing his head back and his arm up.

Reaching out: Nick also shared a shot of him and the band singing Britney Spears' Hit Me Baby One More Time

Painful move: It ended with him throwing his head back and his arm out. 'If I hit this head move one more time I might end up in the hospital,' he joked

'If I hit this head move one more time I might end up in the hospital,' he joked. 'We have 6 more chances to find out at #EatToTheBeat.'

Meanwhile, Nick is due to host America's Most Musical Family with Ciara, David Dobrik and Debbie Gibson on the judges panel.

The Nickelodeon reality show kicks off on November 1.
description:
It is, famously, the happiest place on earth.
And on Thursday, the 45-year-old singer-host and his BH90210 wife, 38, plus their three children, looked delighted to be at Disney World in Orlando, Florida.
